title: How to Change the Order of Filters on Instagram

steps.headline: Open Instagram.
steps.description: This icon is pink with a camera symbol on it. If you aren’t logged in automatically, type your username and password into the fields provided and hit Log In.

steps.headline: Tap the add photo button.
steps.description: It's located at the bottom of the Instagram screen and is marked with the + icon.

steps.headline: Tap  Library.
steps.description: It's at the bottom of the screen. This will bring up your picture library.

steps.headline: Tap Next.
steps.description: It's at the top of the screen. A row of filters will pop up on the bottom of the screen.

steps.headline: Drag and drop the filter into the desired location.
steps.description: Your filters will re-arrange themselves in response. You can also drag a filter into the Drag to Hide box above the filter row. This will remove the filter from your list.

text: Open Instagram. This icon is pink with a camera symbol on it. If you aren’t logged in automatically, type your username and password into the fields provided and hit Log In. Tap the add photo button. It's located at the bottom of the Instagram screen and is marked with the + icon. Tap  Library. It's at the bottom of the screen. This will bring up your picture library. Tap Next. It's at the top of the screen. A row of filters will pop up on the bottom of the screen. Tap and hold a filter. It will enlarge when selected. Drag and drop the filter into the desired location. Your filters will re-arrange themselves in response. You can also drag a filter into the Drag to Hide box above the filter row. This will remove the filter from your list.
